name: Flairtender
description: Flairtender is a virtual reality bartending game that has you mixing drinks with style! Start off small making a few simple cocktails, and in no time you'll be a master mixologist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires tracked motion controllers for input
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires tracked motion controllers for input
